verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ وَٱلَّيْلِ إِذَا يَغْشَىٰ
verses.translation_en: By the night when it covers
verses.translation_zh: 以笼罩时的黑夜发誓，

verses.translation_en: And [by] the day when it appears
verses.translation_zh: 以显著时的白昼发誓，

verses.translation_en: And [by] He who created the male and female,
verses.translation_zh: 以创造男性和女性的主发誓，

verses.translation_en: Indeed, your efforts are diverse.
verses.translation_zh: 你们的行为，确是不同的。

verses.translation_en: As for he who gives and fears Allah
verses.translation_zh: 至於赈济贫民，敬畏真主，

verses.translation_en: And believes in the best [reward],
verses.translation_zh: 且承认至善者，

verses.translation_en: We will ease him toward ease.
verses.translation_zh: 我将使他易於达到最易的结局。

verses.translation_en: But as for he who withholds and considers himself free of need
verses.translation_zh: 至於吝惜钱财，自谓无求，

verses.translation_en: And denies the best [reward],
verses.translation_zh: 且否认至善者，

verses.translation_en: We will ease him toward difficulty.
verses.translation_zh: 我将使他易於达到最难的结局。

verses.text: وَمَا يُغْنِى عَنْهُ مَالُهُۥٓ إِذَا تَرَدَّىٰٓ
verses.translation_en: And what will his wealth avail him when he falls?
verses.translation_zh: 当他沦亡的时候，他的财产於他有什麽裨益呢！

verses.translation_en: Indeed, [incumbent] upon Us is guidance.
verses.translation_zh: 我确有指导的责任，

verses.translation_en: And indeed, to Us belongs the Hereafter and the first [life].
verses.translation_zh: 我确有後世和今世的主权。

verses.translation_en: So I have warned you of a Fire which is blazing.
verses.translation_zh: 故我警告你们一种发焰的火，

verses.translation_en: None will [enter to] burn therein except the most wretched one.
verses.translation_zh: 唯薄命者坠入其中，

verses.translation_en: Who had denied and turned away.
verses.translation_zh: 他否认真理，而背弃之。

verses.translation_en: But the righteous one will avoid it -
verses.translation_zh: 敬畏者，得免於火刑。

verses.translation_en: [He] who gives [from] his wealth to purify himself
verses.translation_zh: 他虔诚地施舍他的财产，

verses.text: وَمَا لِأَحَدٍ عِندَهُۥ مِن نِّعْمَةٍ تُجْزَىٰٓ
verses.translation_en: And not [giving] for anyone who has [done him] a favor to be rewarded
verses.translation_zh: 他没有受过任何人的应报的恩德，

verses.translation_en: But only seeking the countenance of his Lord, Most High.
verses.translation_zh: 但他施舍只是为了求他的至尊主的喜悦，

verses.translation_en: And he is going to be satisfied.
verses.translation_zh: 他自己将来必定喜悦。
